item.name: Folio
item.description: Folio "Of illnesses and their use". Author - I. Von Neiman. Describes methods of extraction and storage of various diseases.

item.name: Portable laboratory
item.description: Miniature laboratory with everything needed to brew potions.

item.name: Butter sandwich
item.description: Goes well with every meal. Restores 25 HP.

item.name: Baked chicken
item.description: Baked chicken. Still warm. Restores 50 HP.

item.name: Royal dinner
item.description: Rice, baked chicken, partridge wings, mushroom soup, blood steak, three liters of borsch, jacket potatoes, triple-fried herring in five coats, mushroom potties, cabbage rolls with real cabbages, chocolate-covered breadsticks, cake "Napoleon", fifty four vanilla shrimps, jello pockets and nice apple. Restores 100 HP.

item.name: Potion of cold
item.description: Modified common cold. Infected enemy will receive 15 damage each turn and with high change will infect neighbouring enemies.

item.name: Potion of chills
item.description: Enemies will feel constant chills and won't be able to attack and defend as effectively.

item.name: Potion of flu
item.description: Infected enemies will feel very sick and won't be able to fight.

item.name: Potion of rabies
item.description: Infected enemies will be attacking everything in sight.
